ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: It is *very* easy to have full bronze by 18 or before! Just go to Unrest and buy all the bronze off of the over-weight people in there.  It sells for cheap. Of
ygData.messageBody:
It is *very* easy to have full bronze by 18 or before! Just go to Unrest and
buy all the bronze off of the over-weight people in there. It sells for
cheap. Of course, that only works for us stouts. If you want medium bronze,
good luck.

Astur, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro
